short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Achieve your goals by setting objectives and tracking your progress with check-ins.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remind Day is a browser extension that helps you achieve your goals by setting objectives, receiving reminders, and tracking progress with check-ins. No sign-up is required. It’s free to use.

Key Features:
✅ Objectives and key results - Create measurable goals and visually see your progress.
✅ Daily check-ins - Stay motivated and document your progress with a daily prompt.
✅ Scheduled reminder notifications - Never forget to check in on your goals with notifications.
✅ Light and dark themes - Choose a light or dark theme that’s easy on the eyes.

Future Releases:
☁️ Cloud backup - Sync your data with the cloud.

Note:
Your data is stored locally in the browser and will not sync across different devices. If you uninstall the extension, all your data will be deleted. However, you can manually download a backup of your data and restore it.

Support:
Have a question or feedback? Please send an email to info@remindday.com

----

Thank you for trying Remind Day! Please consider leaving a review if you like the extension.

Melinda Golden
